Detailed Description

template<int K, typename T, bool REBALANCE = false, bool CUT_ON_INSERT = false, bool MAINTAIN_SIZE = false, bool MAINTAIN_HEIGHT = false>
class KHPTree< K, T, REBALANCE, CUT_ON_INSERT, MAINTAIN_SIZE, MAINTAIN_HEIGHT >

K is the number of dimensions T is search type C is whether to cut included nodes or not
